quest.name: Make It Sweeter
journal: Debroye is eager to begin the process of improving the panaloaf.

Debroye has tasked you with crafting jugs of panaloaf sweetener.

※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 110. Delivering items with a rating of 220 or more will earn greater rewards.
You deliver the panaloaf sweetener to Debroye. It seems you have time to hone your craft while she considers the problem of texture...
objectives: Deliver jugs of panaloaf sweetener to Debroye.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Let us get straight down to business, shall we?

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: The main problem with panaloaf is that the recipe calls for a wide variety of wholesome substances, resulting in an extremely eclectic─and subsequently, extremely disgusting─mixture of flavors.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Now, I've managed to bake a slightly less repulsive version by adjusting the balance of ingredients, but the taste remains indistinct and unsatisfying. It needs seasoning of some kind, and badly.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: To that end, I've put together a recipe for a sweetener using those materials which are readily available in Labyrinthos. Not in any amount which would contradict our healthy and nutritious mandate, of course.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Concocting the sweetener itself, however, is a job for the experts, and so I'd like to entrust it to you. Very soon, we will have taken our first step to making the panaloaf halfway enjoyable!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Faculty of Medicine Deliveries are now available. By delivering the requested items to Debroye and raising yourself in her esteem, you can assist her with her mission to turn panaloaf into a properly perfect meal.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: The recipe for the sweetener isn't giving you any trouble, I hope? I can hardly wait to see how it turns out!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename! This should go a long way to improving the panaloaf's flavor.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename! After trying a little taste, I can safely say that you've managed to hit the sweet spot─not overly mild, and not overly rich.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Debroye's trust.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the items Debroye needs, and deliver them often to improve your standing with the Faculty of Medicine!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: With your sweetener added to the mix, I went ahead and baked a second test batch of panaloaf.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: As for the result, well, I took some samples over to the Last Stand for the customers to try.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: And they said the taste was...passable! Which is a significant improvement over the nausea-inducing wretchedness of the original recipe. As I had hoped, a little sweetness was instrumental in tying the myriad flavors together.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: The key here being “a little sweetness”─we wouldn't want to go overboard and endanger the nutritional balance of our perfect meal!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm told one of our regulars is at his table today, and he is a man with a decidedly particular palate. Why don't we head over and ask for his impression of our second batch?

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: If I may ask, what did you think of the bread, sir?

dialogue.name: FLAUGUSTERT
dialogue.text: (-Refined Gentleman-)Hm, not bad, not bad...

dialogue.name: FLAUGUSTERT
dialogue.text: (-Refined Gentleman-)I give the flavor a passing grade. The texture, however, needs some attention.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Ah, the texture...

dialogue.name: FLAUGUSTERT
dialogue.text: (-Refined Gentleman-)'Tis not overly noticeable with a bite-sized sample, but after one or two full slices, I fear one might begin to struggle with the somewhat dry and powdery consistency.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: I...had not considered that. Thank you for your most valuable insight, sir! We will certainly keep that in mind for future batches!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Well, that was a much-needed reminder. In my rush to enhance the flavor, I've neglected to account for changes in the texture.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Introducing the sweetener must have affected the consistency of the dough... <sigh> Nothing is ever simple, is it?

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Improving the texture will be our next task, then. I'll give the problem some thought, then we can work together on creating the solution!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Debroye is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a Reliable Baker!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next request will be available from Debroye upon reaching level 83 as an alchemist or culinarian.
